text: ni enneat kalpicca karyam athava enreyum ninnaluteyum raksitavaya allahuve ninnal aradhikkanam enna karyam matrame nanavareat parannittullu. nan avarkkitayil untayirunnappealeakke nan avarute mel saksiyayirunnu. pinnit ni enne purnnamayi erretuttappeal ni tanneyayirunnu avare niriksiccirunnavan. ni ellakaryattinum saksiyakunnu
